root.name: Ready, Steady, Cook: The Game
root.description: Overview Ready, Steady, Cook: The Game, is based off of the British cooking show, in which members of the public have to cook a meal from a certain budget of random ingredients. They are split into two teams, the Red Tomatoes and the Green Peppers and both have a celebrity chief to help them out. After they have cooked the meal, the audience then votes for who they thought did the best meal. The game also follows the same routine, but lacks any celebrity appearances.

similar_games.game: Cooking Guide: Can't Decide What to Eat?
